metadata.title: CVE-2023-1183

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 15 SP5

metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Libreoffice package. An attacker can craft an odb containing a "database/script" file with a SCRIPT command where the contents of the file could be written to a new file whose location was determined by the attacker.
